code: @Test public void json() throws Exception {     standaloneSetup(new PersonController()).build().perform(get("/person/Lee").accept(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)).andExpect(status().isOk()).andExpect(content().contentType("application/json.charset=UTF-8")).andExpect(jsonPath("$.name").value("Lee")). }
@RequestMapping(value = "/person/{name}") @ResponseBody public Person get(@PathVariable String name) {     return new Person(name). }
